gnat.retrieval
Class PubmedAccess

java.lang.Object
  gnat.retrieval.PubmedAccess

public class PubmedAccess
extends java.lang.Object

Routines to query PubMed: keyword searches that return a list of PubMed IDs.

Author:
Joerg Hakenberg

URI_EUTILS_PUBMEDIDSFORQUERYTERM

public static final java.lang.String URI_EUTILS_PUBMEDIDSFORQUERYTERM
To get a PubMed eUtils query, put together the QUERYTERM-URI, the query string, the RETMAXEXTENSION and the corresponding limit (if needed)

URI_PUBMED_EUTILS_GETCITATIONS

public static java.lang.String URI_PUBMED_EUTILS_GETCITATIONS
Link to retrieve a set of PubMed citations for given IDs. Append the IDs, comma separated, to this string.

PubmedAccess

Method Detail

getAbstracts

public static java.lang.String[] getAbstracts(java.lang.String[] pubmedIDs)
Returns an array of abstract texts for a given array of Pubmed Ids. If unknown ids are encountered, the length of the array returned varies from the given array of ids, ie. it is of shorter length. Concatenates title and abstract text with a single white space.

Parameters:
pubmedIDs -
Returns:
String[]

getAbstractsAsTitleAndText

public static java.lang.String[][] getAbstractsAsTitleAndText(java.lang.String[] pubmedIDs)
Returns an array of abstract texts for a given array of Pubmed Ids. If unknown ids are encountered, the length of the array returned varies from the given array of ids, ie. it is of shorter length.

Parameters:
pubmedIDs -
Returns:
String[]

getAbstractsAsTitleAndTextFromXML

public static java.lang.String[][] getAbstractsAsTitleAndTextFromXML(java.lang.String content)

getAbstractsAsDocument

public static org.jdom.Document getAbstractsAsDocument(java.lang.String content)
Parses the given content, a MedlineCitationSet, and returns a Document.

Splits all texts (title and abstract) into sentences (element 'SENT') and adds attributes for PubMed ID and sentence ID to each sentence.

Parameters:
content -
Returns:
Document
Throws:
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException

getAbstractsAsDocumentWithAnnotations

public static org.jdom.Document getAbstractsAsDocumentWithAnnotations(java.lang.String content)
Parses the given content, a MedlineCitationSet, and returns a Document.
Just adds the namespace, no sentence splitting, XML reduction, etc.

Parameters:
content -
Returns:
Document
Throws:
java.io.IOException
org.jdom.JDOMException

getAbstractsFromXML

public static java.lang.String[] getAbstractsFromXML(java.lang.String xml)
Returns an array of abstract texts from a MedlineCitationSet XML. Concatenates title and text with a single white space.

Parameters:
xml -
Returns:
String[]

getRelatedPubmedIdsForPubmedIds

public static java.lang.String[] getRelatedPubmedIdsForPubmedIds(java.lang.String pubmedIds,
                                                                 int max)
                                                          throws java.io.IOException
Returns an array of PubMed IDs that are related to the given PubMed ID (or comma separated list of PubMed IDs), as calculated by PubMed Related Articles.

max -

getPubmedIDsForQuery

public static java.lang.String[] getPubmedIDsForQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                                      int max)
                                               throws java.io.IOException
Returns an array of Pubmed IDs for a given Pubmed query.

Parameters:
query - - the query, a keyword search, as entered in AliBaba by the user
max - - max. number of ids to return
Throws:
java.io.IOException
